## Description {#details}

This file defines MallocAllocator.

MallocAllocator conforms to the LLVM &quot;Allocator&quot; concept which consists of an Allocate method accepting a size and alignment, and a Deallocate accepting a pointer and size. Further, the LLVM &quot;Allocator&quot; concept has overloads of Allocate and Deallocate for setting size and alignment based on the final type. These overloads are typically provided by a base class template <code>AllocatorBase</code>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Defines

### LLVM&#95;ALLOCATORHOLDER&#95;EMPTYBASE {#ad583ef2556f8ad294bd3005c4ac718ff}

<MemberDefinition

</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
